title: X-Prize - Beyond Space (Part 2)
description:
In the conclusion of Neil deGrasse Tyson’s interview with Peter Diamandis, we explore how the X-Prize Foundation inspires out-of-the-box solutions to the world’s greatest problems.
Read more and listen to the full show: http://www.startalkradio.net/show/x-prize-beyond-space/
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
